game.entities.fields

Class Territory

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.entities.fields.AbstractFields
      • game.entities.fields.AbstractOwnable
        • game.entities.fields.Territory

  • public class Territory
extends AbstractOwnable
    The Ownable Field of type Territory - the common buyable field in a Monopoly game.
    See Also:
    Territory#Territory(String, int, int[])

      Creates a Ownable Field of type Territory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Territory

        public Territory(int id,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 int price,
                 int housePrice,
                 java.lang.String color,
                 int[] rent)
        Creates a Ownable Field of type Territory. Rent is calculated according to number of hotels, houses and owned territories of the same color.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the field
        name - Name of the Field
        price - Price of buying the Field
        housePrice - The price of buying a new house.
        color - The color group of the field.
        rent - Array, size 6. Indexes:

        0 = rent without houses

        1-4 = rent with 1-4 houses

        5 = rent with hotel

        See Also:
        AbstractOwnable

    • Method Detail

      • setNumHouses

        public void setNumHouses(int i)
        Assigns houses to the territory. Must be at least 0 and at most 4.
        Parameters:
        i - The number of houses to assign (0-4)

        public int getNumHouses()
        Returns:
        The number of houses on the field

        Parameters:

      • hasHotel

        public boolean hasHotel()
